detail_desc: Sun caps in an airy cotton weave with a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck. One cap with an all-over print.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Treggings with a high waist and concealed elastication.

Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, superstretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist and zip in one side. Chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with a press-stud.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Chelsea boots in shiny leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Organic cotton linings and leather insoles.

Patterned set with a top in soft jersey and shorts and a sun hat in a cotton weave. Top with short, flounced sleeves, a chest pocket and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft fine knit made from a soft wool blend with a ribbed polo neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.
5-pocket trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly and adjustable tabs with buttons at the sides. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-ups. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Wide, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a sewn-in tie belt and pleats at the top. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Short, off-the-shoulder lace dress with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the top. Short, elasticated flounced sleeves, a concealed zip in the side and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waist, decorative ring at the front and medium coverage at the back.
Cropped, fitted, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Short sleeves and an overlocked edge around the top, sleeves and hem.
Blouse in airy, crinkled, patterned fabric with a round neck and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Fully lined, smocked bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Top in soft pile with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed cuffs.
Blouse in an airy, weave with a V-neck, buttons and pin-tucks down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and short, flounced sleeves. Unlined.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Pyjama shorts in soft, ribbed jersey with covered elastication at the waist and overlocked hems with short slits.
Knee-length, A-line skirt in satin made from silk containing some elastane with a high waist. Unlined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups and wide, lightly padded, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Extra elastic straps at the back for maximum support and an elastic hem with hook-and-eye fasteners. Extra firm support.
Necklace of two different metal chains, one with a rod-shaped pendant and one with a pendant in the shape of a feather. Adjustable length.
Gloves in grained leather with concealed elastication at the wrists. Pile lining.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Trousers in superstretch twill with a high waist with concealed elastication, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Short jersey skirt with a draped wrapover front and concealed elastication at the waist.

Cable-knit jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed, roll-edge polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Stocking-stitched back, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Bucket bag in imitation leather with a decorative seam front and back, a handle and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Extra section at the top in imitation suede with a drawstring closure. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 13x23x23 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Sandals in soft leather with narrow straps at the front and long, narrow straps that tie around the ankles. Leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. Seamless.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and a concealed zip in one side. Fake welt pockets at the back and slim legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Short-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Collarless satin blouse with concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Short shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in lace with narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Tube top in soft jersey. The cotton content of the top is organic.
V-neck body in pleated jersey with a sheen. Wrapover top, long raglan sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton with a collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with good air permeability to wick away moisture. Some of the polyester content of the tops is recycled.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.

Track pants in fast-drying functional fabric with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Mesh-lined side pockets, contrasting colour panels down the sides and a concealed zip at the hems.
Top in printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Boxer briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed cuffs and hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Longer jacket woven in a viscose blend with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in mesh embroidered with sequins. Opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Trainers in imitation suede and imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and metal details at the sides. Linings and insoles in recycled polyester.
Boxer shorts in stretch, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and slightly longer legs.
Wide linen trousers with a high waist, pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the sides and crotch.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a visible seam down the front and a decorative knot detail at the hem.
Joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, patch front pockets, fake fly, back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Lightly padded fabric Alice band decorated with pearly plastic beads and plastic rhinestones.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Bikini top with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back.
Hat in braided straw with a string band, small motif on the brim and a frayed edge.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and rounded hem.

5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Slim-fit trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
